p.s: Do you like The Beatles , but you 're not really a true fan ?
The Beatles are still popular today , and have been for years !
Be a fan with article , and you 'll be a fan in no time !

item.s: Buy all the music you can find on online stores and at Target .
You are bound to find their music under " Classic Rock .
" " Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band " is really popular , as is " Strawberry Fields Forever " and " Rubber Soul " , but almost all their music is a must have if you want to be a true fan .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 1 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Buy various T-shirts .
T-shirts are essential when you 're a Beatles fan .
You can find all sorts of T-shirts of The Beatles on Amazon or eBay .
Try to buy brand new ones .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Buy some memorabilia .
You can find all your Beatles stuff on eBay and Amazon .
Memorabilia is also a good thing to have when you 're a true fan of something .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Have/make some posters .
Posters of The Beatles can be found in a lot places .
Try to get one with all four of them in the picture .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Listen to their music all the time .
Do n't play it aloud late at night when people are sleeping , though .
Then you 'll just be a nuisance .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Wear your T-shirts all the time and let people see your memorabilia !

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Study up on the history of the Fab Four .
Read biographies and autobiographies , watch documentaries ( the Beatles anthology videos are very good ) , films the four starred in like , " A Hard Day 's Night " and " Help !
" Study Lennon 's artwork .
Anything that will help you connect and feel closer to the Four Lads from Liverpool !

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Listen to the solo work .

If you learn a bit about John and his Plastic Ono Band , Paul McCartney and Wings , George Harrison and his Traveling Wilburys , and Ringo and his All Starr Band , you 'll begin to recognize each member as an individual person , and not just as one whole group known as The Beatles . You 'll grow familiar with their music styles , the things they sing about , and the way each man was .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 8 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Learn the meaning behind each song .
It helps you learn about their lives , families , and interests .
You 'll begin to feel close and you may even be able to relate to each member ! It adds a bit of a story and even more meaning to the songs they had written .

figure.rend: Be a Beatles Fan Step 9 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Wearing your T-shirts will help people to realize you love The Beatles .
Knowing about The Beatles ' backstory is all about being a fan of them .
If you want to listen to the Beatles in a really nostalgic and traditional way , listen to them on vinyl .
However , this may be difficult as many original copies of Beatles ' albums are worth a fortune nowadays .
